title: Manage Lashing Gear Inventory
description: A stevedoring supervisor needs to ensure there is enough lashing equipment (e.g., twistlocks, lashing bars) for the next vessel.

tasks.description: Check the current inventory of lashing gear in the storage cages.
tasks.expected_outcome: Supervisor performs a physical count or checks the inventory system.

tasks.description: Identify a shortage of automatic twistlocks.
tasks.expected_outcome: The count reveals that they are below the minimum required stock level.

tasks.description: Place an order with the procurement department for new twistlocks.
tasks.expected_outcome: A purchase requisition for 500 new twistlocks is created.
